DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To evaluate safety effectiveness cell therapy use herinCAR-PD1 cell treat relapse refractory cancer . Eligibility : Individuals great equal 18 year age less equal 70 year age diagnose relapsed refractory cancer respond relapsed standard treatment .
DOC.brief_title: PD-1 Antibody Expressing CAR-T Cells EGFR Family Member Positive Advanced Solid Tumor ( Lung , Liver Stomach )
DOC.detailed_description: A total 20 patient may enrol period 1-2 year .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18~65 year old , male female ; 2 . Life expectancy≥6 month ; 3 . ECOG score : 03 ; 4 . Advanced solid tumor ( lung cancer , gastric cancer , liver cancer ) diagnose pathological clinical physician ; 5 . Enough venous channel , contraindication separation collection white blood cell ; 6 . Immunohistochemistry RTPCR technology use determine positive EGFR family ( include EGFR , HER2 , HER4 ) IGFR1 protein . At least one protein express immunohistochemical tumor tissue less grade 2 2+ score . The level protein define follow : ( accord cell stain ) : grade 0 : without stain ; grade 1 : 125 % ; grade 2 : 2650 % grade 3 : 51100 % ; ( According intensity ) : negative ; 1+ ; 2+ 3+ ; 7 . Laboratory examination : white blood cell≥3 x 10*9/L , blood platelet count≥60 x 10*/L , hemoglobin≥85g/L ; lymphocyte count≥15 % , total bilirubin≤100 mol/L ; ALT AST less five time normal level ; serum creatinine less 1.5 time normal level； 8 . Signed inform consent； 9 . Women childbearing age must evidence negative pregnancy test willing practice birth control 2 week follow cell transfusion . 1 . Expected Overall survival ＜ 6 month ; 2 . Patients uncontrolled hypertension , unstable coronary disease ( uncontrolled arrhythmia , unstable angina , decompensated congestive heart failure ( > Class II , NYHA ) , myocardial infarction within 6 month . 3 . Abnormal lung function : FEV ( forced expiratory volume ) < 30 % prediction , DLCO ( diffuse capacity lung carbon monoxide ) < 30 % prediction , blood oxygen saturation < 90 % ; 4 . Other serious disease : nervous , mental disorder , immune regulatory disease , metabolic disease , infectious disease , etc ; 5 . Unable unwilling provide inform consent , fail comply test requirement .
